LanguageData.VFEC.UI.GainingFavor: Gaining the favor of this senator will unlock:
LanguageData.VFEC.UI.GainingFavorAll: Gaining the favor of all senators will unlock:
LanguageData.VFEC.UI.Info: Gaining favor of a senator will have that senator join your colony. Losing that senator will force you to impress a new one. As such, you should aim to keep them alive.\n Gain support of all the senators to unlock unique perks and eventually unite the Republics under your rule. Once you gain favor of all 5 senators of any Republic, the perks are yours forever, no matter what happens to Senators.
LanguageData.VFEC.UI.NotEnoughMoney: You do not have enough money with you to do this.
LanguageData.VFEC.UI.BribeReject: {0} has rejected your bribe and can no longer be bribed.
LanguageData.VFEC.UI.AlreadyQuest: Already have a quest for that senator.
